trans-unit.source: Base class for asymmetric keys.
trans-unit.target: Basisklasse for asymmetriske nøkler.

trans-unit.source: You cannot use this class when [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/add/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] is running under partial trust.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke dette klasse når [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/add/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] kjører under delvis klarering.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.AsymmetricSecurityKey"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.AsymmetricSecurityKey"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the specified asymmetric cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Henter den angitte asymmetriske kryptografiske algoritmen når overstyres i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use the static fields of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> class to specify the algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Bruk statiske felt for den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms>klassen for å angi algoritme.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms>

trans-unit.source: The asymmetric algorithm to create.
trans-unit.target: Den asymmetriske algoritmen til å opprette.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when a private key is required to create the algorithm; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Når en privat nøkkel er nødvendig for å opprette algoritmen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm"></xref> that represents the specified asymmetric cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm"> </xref> som representerer den angitte asymmetriske kryptografiske algoritmen.

trans-unit.source: Typically, is passed into the privateKey parameter, as a private key is typically required for decryption.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis er sendt til den privateKey parameteren som en privat nøkkel kreves vanligvis for dekryptering.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a cryptographic algorithm that generates a hash for a digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, får du en kryptografisk algoritme som genererer en hash-kode for en digital signatur.

trans-unit.source: Use the static fields of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> class to specify the algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Bruk statiske felt for den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms>klassen for å angi algoritme.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms>

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Hash-algoritmen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm"></xref> that generates hashes for digital signatures.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm"> </xref> som genererer numre for signaturer.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the deformatter algorithm for the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, henter algoritmen deformatter for digital signatur.

trans-unit.source: A signature deformatter is typically used to verify a digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Signaturdeformatering brukes vanligvis til å bekrefte en digital signatur.

trans-unit.source: Use the static fields of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> class to specify the algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Bruk statiske felt for den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms>klassen for å angi algoritme.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms>

trans-unit.source: The deformatter algorithm for the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Algoritmen deformatter for digital signatur.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter"></xref> that represents the deformatter algorithm for the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter"> </xref> som representerer deformatter algoritmen for digital signatur.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the formatter algorithm for the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, henter algoritmen formatering for digital signatur.

trans-unit.source: Typically, a signature formatter is used to generate a digital signature.
trans-unit.target: En signatur formatering brukes vanligvis til å generere en digital signatur.

trans-unit.source: Use the static fields of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> class to specify the algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Bruk statiske felt for den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms>klassen for å angi algoritme.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms>

trans-unit.source: The formatter algorithm for the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Algoritmen formatering for digital signatur.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureFormatter"></xref> that represents the formatter algorithm for the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureFormatter"> </xref> som representerer algoritmen formatering for digital signatur.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the private key is available.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den private nøkkelen er tilgjengelig når overstyres i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when the private key is available; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Når den private nøkkelen er tilgjengelig. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
